LanguageData.CraftingRimcardTable.label: Rimcard Crafting Table
LanguageData.CraftingRimcardTable.description: Craft RimCards from dust and other things.
LanguageData.DisenchantingRimcardTable.label: Rimcard Disenchanting Table
LanguageData.DisenchantingRimcardTable.description: Disenchant Rimcards to collect dust or craft RimCards from dust. You can also create Shiny Rimcards using the original version and some gold.
